title: Google\Cloud\NaturalLanguage\NaturalLanguageClient
name: NaturalLanguageClient
description: Google Cloud Natural Language client. Provides natural language understanding technologies to developers, including sentiment analysis, entity recognition, and syntax analysis. Currently only English, Spanish, and Japanese textual context are supported. Find more information at Google Cloud Natural Language docs.

examples.caption: The NaturalLanguage client can also be instantianted directly.

params.name: config
params.description: Configuration Options.

params.name: config.projectId
params.description: The project ID from the Google Developer's Console.

params.name: config.authHttpHandler
params.description: A handler used to deliver Psr7 requests specifically for authentication.

params.name: config.httpHandler
params.description: A handler used to deliver Psr7 requests.

params.name: config.keyFile
params.description: The contents of the service account credentials .json file retrieved from the Google Developers Console.

params.name: config.keyFilePath
params.description: The full path to your service account credentials .json file retrieved from the Google Developers Console.

params.name: config.retries
params.description: Number of retries for a failed request. Defaults to 3.

params.name: config.scopes
params.description: Scopes to be used for the request.

methods.name: analyzeEntities
methods.description: Finds named entities (currently finds proper names) in the text, entity types, salience, mentions for each entity, and other properties in the document.

params.name: content
params.description: The content to analyze.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration options.

params.name: options.type
params.description: The document type. Acceptable values are PLAIN_TEXT or HTML. Defaults to PLAIN_TEXT.

params.name: options.language
params.description: The language of the document. Both ISO (e.g., en, es) and BCP-47 (e.g., en-US, es-ES) language codes are accepted. Defaults to English.

params.name: options.encodingType
params.description: The text encoding type used by the API to calculate offsets. Acceptable values are NONE, UTF8, UTF16 and UTF32. Defaults to UTF8.

methods.name: analyzeSentiment
methods.description: Analyzes the sentiment of the provided document. Currently only supports English text.

params.name: content
params.description: The content to analyze.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration options.

params.name: options.type
params.description: The document type. Acceptable values are PLAIN_TEXT or HTML. Defaults to PLAIN_TEXT.

params.name: options.language
params.description: The language of the document. Both ISO (e.g., en, es) and BCP-47 (e.g., en-US, es-ES) language codes are accepted. Defaults to English.

methods.name: analyzeSyntax
methods.description: Analyzes the document and provides a full set of text annotations. This method wraps Google\Cloud\NaturalLanguage\NaturalLanguageClient::annotateText().

params.name: content
params.description: The content to analyze.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration options.

params.name: options.type
params.description: The document type. Acceptable values are PLAIN_TEXT or HTML. Defaults to PLAIN_TEXT.

params.name: options.language
params.description: The language of the document. Both ISO (e.g., en, es) and BCP-47 (e.g., en-US, es-ES) language codes are accepted. Defaults to English.

params.name: options.encodingType
params.description: The text encoding type used by the API to calculate offsets. Acceptable values are NONE, UTF8, UTF16 and UTF32. Defaults to UTF8.

methods.name: annotateText
methods.description: Analyzes the document and provides a full set of text annotations, including semantic, syntactic, and sentiment information. Please note that English is currently the only support language for the sentiment feature.

examples.caption: Annotate text with all features enabled.
Annotate text with syntax and sentiment features enabled.

params.name: content
params.description: The content to annotate.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration options.

params.name: options.features
params.description: Features to apply to the request. Valid values are syntax, sentiment, and entities. If no features are provided the request will run with all three enabled.

params.name: options.type
params.description: The document type. Acceptable values are PLAIN_TEXT or HTML. Defaults to PLAIN_TEXT.

params.name: options.language
params.description: The language of the document. Both ISO (e.g., en, es) and BCP-47 (e.g., en-US, es-ES) language codes are accepted. Defaults to English.

params.name: options.encodingType
params.description: The text encoding type used by the API to calculate offsets. Acceptable values are NONE, UTF8, UTF16 and UTF32. Defaults to UTF8.
